newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: RESEARCH ALERT - Cosmos rated a buy.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Cosmos rated a buy.

text.p: Sun Hung Kai Securities (Phil) Inc recommended on Wednesday a buy for Cosmos Bottling Corp, saying it is the only company in the Philippine beverage sector experiencing double-digit growth rates.

"The company expects sales volume growth between 30-40 percent annually in 1996 and 1997. This growth will come from capacity expansion brought about by plant refurbishments and additional lines," said Raul Ruiz, vice president at Sun Hung Kai.
Sales growth in 1995 was 38 percent while for the first six months of 1996 it was 30.2 percent, Ruiz said.
With the softening of raw material prices and increasing consumer demand, Ruiz said Cosmos should post higher growth rates.

Ruiz said Cosmos suffers from prevailing negative sentiment towards the beverage sector. He said the issue is trading at a substantial discount to the price-earnings ratio of the market and the sector itself.
But Ruiz said that Cosmos advantage is that it is priced 30 to 40 percent below competition since it does not need to pay a franchise pricing unlike other foreign brands.
On Tuesday, Cosmos hit its year high ending at 4.20 pesos a share. - Manila newsroom 8418939 fax 8176267
